wblut.hemesh

Class HEC_FromFacelist

  • java.lang.Object
    • wblut.hemesh.HEC_Creator
      • wblut.hemesh.HEC_FromFacelist
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HEC_UVParametric

    public class HEC_FromFacelist
extends HEC_Creator
    Creates a new mesh from a list of vertices and faces. Vertices can be duplicate.
    Author:
    Frederik Vanhoutte (W:Blut)
